text: U allaha nai ta ho jasale suryala'i prakasamana ra candrala'i jyotimaya banayo ra yasako lagi vibhinna sthitiharu sthapita garyo, taki timile varsaharuko ganana ra hisaba thaha pa'une gara. Yi sabai kuraharu allahale satyako satha srsti gareko cha. Bujhneharuko lagi usale aphna ayataharu spastarupama varnana gardaicha
